review: Easy to setup and use. However, apps are very limited, Even Chrome does not supported.And the review needs more word. Gotta say youtube have done a really good job on all kinds of platforms.
author: fei lin

review: Nice little unit.  Cannot wait till there are more apps.  Very user friendly. This is a nice product and worth the dollars.  Much better than Apple TV for long term streaming.
author: oarbutt

review: Best price I found on the web.  Shipping was fast!!  I have Roku on one tv and added this to the other.  I now have one to play movies for the kids.  We follow the Canton Charge, NBA dLeague.  I can now watch the games on tv!!  (Youtube). I just wish google had more apps.
author: T. Murphy

review: The devices seems simple to use and probably is if it worked consistently.  My device requires me to reinitialize the account every time.  It worked great when I streamed Netflix the first time I got it to work then when I went in the second time I had to reiitialize my account.  What a pain...
author: Adam J Sortino

review: If you don't already have Netflix capability then this could be OK, but it takes forever to load the streaming videos.  We already have a TV that has Netflix, so we wanted this because it says it streams HBO Go and Hulu+... NOT TRUE!  Lame.  We returned it.  You are probably better off with a ROKU or something else. This is a great idea, but it needs a lot of work.
author: JLW

review: So cheap yet so awesome.  I use it daily and I canceled my cable subscription as well. I put an antenna in the attic to get CBS, FOX, NBC, and ABC.  Then I use chromecast to supplement what I do not get for free over the air with the antenna...
author: Bryan D Shephard

review: It is basic and works just with YouTube and fresh rate is slow. Hope Google expands on user tools very soon.
author: Dhar Jattipatti

review: I really like this media player, it works perfectly good quality of image and audio, I'm no giving 5 stars only because it doesn't have too much applications on its compatible list yet, once they have more than the bunch of apps I'll give them 5 stars.
author: Alan Cruz "alanof"

review: It is awkward to use. I think I will stick with my Roku. I am a Google fan, but they missed the mark with this one.
author: Dirk P. Dorresteyn "Dirk"

review: I love this thing.  I leave it on my Bedroom TV and control it with my iPhone.  No buffering, clear picture and sound...and I can use the closed captioning which is easily controlled through the phone.  What a cool invention.
author: Amazon Customer
